interviews.name: Robert Vazquez-Pacheco
interviews.transcript: In this interview, Robert Vazquez-Pacheco discusses his role in the Majority Action committee, his efforts to promote safe sex practices within the Latina/o community, and his collaboration with other activists in ACT UP.

interviews.name: Moisés Agosto
interviews.transcript: Moisés Agosto talks about the work of ACT UP Puerto Rico, focusing on the challenges faced by activists in the Latina/o community and the impact of HIV/AIDS in Puerto Rico. He emphasizes the importance of community action and the role of grassroots organizing in addressing health disparities.
